content: I do not have access to the latest updates and initiatives of target towards supporting local charities and non-profit organizations. however, historically, target has been actively involved in supporting the communities where it operates. target has donated millions of dollars to local non-profit organizations in various areas, including education, arts, social services, and disaster relief. the company has also encouraged its employees to volunteer and contribute to local communities and offers various grants for non-profit organizations. overall, target aims to make a positive impact on the communities it serves by supporting local organizations and initiatives.
